item.description:
A member had e mailed me recently and asked if we can have an evening of "showing off" our talents whether it is music, dance, singing, comedy acting, etc....
Another meet up group I belong to is having a Talent Show night. I talked with the organizer and he said our Cambridge Singles group is more than welcome to join them.
I am sure there are many talented people in this Cambridge Singles group too including artists, actors and singers. This will be an opportunitey to share and listen to our talents. I understand a member in the other group is already preparing a comedy act for us!!!!!!!
Please bring what ever material you may need (ie: music stand, book box for a tape if doing a dance), etc....
Please note a voluntary donation of 5.00 is suggested to help cover the rent cost of the room. There is a stage available for the evening and also please feel free to bring some light snacks/drinks for us to share.
I personally am looking foward to this event as I know there will be some fun laughs and great entertainment!!!!
I hope to see all of you there and please look for myself, Krista with the balloons as a landmark as this is a joint event with another group. Then we can find a table or two for us to sit together.
Perhaps this may be a good location for our possible casino night in the works???
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a red meet up t shirt on as well as balloons, which seem to work

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Talent Night
